name: Cheyzade
description:
Cheyzade is our successfull project after 27 fail. Game still demo and everything will be changed. We published this demo to see how game optimized and run other computers. Scripts, models almost everything optimized but still we have some known and unknown bugs so if you see one just send us message by facebook.

Thank you!

If you want support us just like our facebook page and give motivation =)

Development Video


Game Controlls :

Enter Exit Bike - "F"

Turn On/Off Bike - "E"

Weed - "R"

Refill gas - "P"

Pickup item - "Left Mouse"

Open Inventory - "I" *opens when near to bike

Gear up bike - "Shift"

Gear down bike - "Left-Ctrl"

WSAD for mowing bike and player.
